rlpack.estimator.dqn module¶

class rlpack.estimator.dqn.DQN(config)[source]¶

Bases: rlpack.estimator.tfestimator.TFEstimator

Deep Q Network.

get_action(obs, epsilon)[source]¶

Get action according to the given observation and epsilon-greedy method.

Args:
obs: observation. epsilon: arguments for epsilon-greedy method.
update(trajectories)[source]¶

Update the model from the collected trajectories.

Args:
trajectories: A list of sampled trajectories. For example: [[(s,a,r,s,d), (s,a,r,s,d), …], [(s,a,r,s,d), (s,a,r,s,d), …]]
